additional_titles.title: ファイト一発！充電ちゃん！！

plots.content: * Based on a seinen manga by Ditama Bow (who also authored Mahoromatic & KissXSis), serialised in Comic Gum.Juden-chan is the name given to a group of special girls — from a different dimension — who use electricity to cheer up suicidal people. To find the people in need, Plug (our heroine) uses a device that tells her a persons level of depression — A being worst, F being happiest. Since Plug and her co-workers come from a different dimension, they can fly, pass through things, and pull magic plugs out of power transformers. Plug tries her best, but encounters, Oumi Sento, a boy who can both see and touch her — usually with a baseball bat. Unfortunately for Plug, his sister is her assignment and she has to get past him to 'charge' her up.
Meet Plug, an unusual girl from a parallel world. Plug is a "Juuden-chan," capable of "recharging" people down on their luck, spreading good cheer wherever she goes!

Plug is a "Jūden-chan" or "Charger Girl" from a dimension parallel to Earth's own. Her job is to find humans in our dimension that are depressed, transform into her rubber suit, and charge them up to revitalize their energy.
